description: Mobile techniques used by TERRACOTTA, ATT&CK software S0545 v1.0
name: TERRACOTTA (S0545)

techniques.comment: [TERRACOTTA](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0545) can obtain a list of installed apps.(Citation: WhiteOps TERRACOTTA)
[TERRACOTTA](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0545) has registered several broadcast receivers.(Citation: WhiteOps TERRACOTTA)
[TERRACOTTA](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0545) can download additional modules at runtime via JavaScript `eval` statements.(Citation: WhiteOps TERRACOTTA)

[TERRACOTTA](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0545) checks whether its call stack has been modified, an indication that it is running in an analysis environment, and if so, does not decrypt its obfuscated strings(Citation: WhiteOps TERRACOTTA).
[TERRACOTTA](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0545) has utilized foreground services.(Citation: WhiteOps TERRACOTTA)
[TERRACOTTA](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0545) has generated non-human advertising impressions.(Citation: WhiteOps TERRACOTTA)

[TERRACOTTA](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0545) can inject clicks to launch applications, share posts on social media, and interact with WebViews to perform fraudulent actions.(Citation: WhiteOps TERRACOTTA)
[TERRACOTTA](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0545) has displayed a form to collect user data after installation.(Citation: WhiteOps TERRACOTTA)
[TERRACOTTA](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0545) has included native modules.(Citation: WhiteOps TERRACOTTA)
[TERRACOTTA](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0545) has stored encoded strings.(Citation: WhiteOps TERRACOTTA)
[TERRACOTTA](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0545) has used timer events in React Native to initiate the foreground service.(Citation: WhiteOps TERRACOTTA)
[TERRACOTTA](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0545) can send SMS messages.(Citation: WhiteOps TERRACOTTA)
[TERRACOTTA](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0545) has collected the device’s phone number and can check if the active network connection is metered.(Citation: WhiteOps TERRACOTTA)
[TERRACOTTA](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0545) has used Firebase for C2 communication.(Citation: WhiteOps TERRACOTTA)
